BodyName: Committee on Civil and Human Rights

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring information about sexual harassment to be made available online for public access
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Stop Sexual Harassment in NYC Act - Requiring information about sexual harassment to be made available online for public access.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to expanding sexual harassment protections to all employees
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Stop Sexual Harassment in NYC Act - Expanding sexual harassment protections to all employees.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to making improvements to clarify and strengthen the human rights law as it relates to sexual harassment
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Stop Sexual Harassment in NYC Act - Making improvements to clarify and strengthen the human rights law as it relates to sexual harassment.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the statute of limitations for filing certain harassment claims arising under the city human rights law
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Stop Sexual Harassment in NYC Act - Statute of limitations for filing certain harassment claims arising under the city human rights law.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Congress to pass, and the President to sign S.2203/H.R.4734, known as the “Ending Forced Arbitration of Sexual Harassment Act of 2017,” which prohibits a predispute arbitration agreement from being valid or enforceable if it requires arbitration of a sex discrimination dispute
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Stop Sexual Harassment in NYC Act - Ending Forced Arbitration of Sexual Harassment Act of 2017 (S.2203/H.R.4734)
